E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 6/12/1989
Subject: Progress of Gary Mielke
Dear Sir,
Gary Mielke is doing pretty good at AA Huntsville Stars!
He has an ERA of 2.08, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/28/1989
Subject: Doug Drabek
Doug Drabek is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor

Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,

Tatsunori Hara



Date: Monday, 7/14/1989
Subject: Progress of Scott Kamieniecki
Dear Sir,
Scott Kamieniecki has nothing more to prove at A Modesto A's!
He has an ERA of 3.86 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 7/17/1989
Subject: Don Carman healing process
Don Carman is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Date: Sunday, 8/10/1989
Subject: Mike Stenhouse failed learning new position
Mike Stenhouse doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director
